title: Floral Diamond Bangle - A Delicate Touch of Tradition
materials: adorned with High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones offering exceptional brilliance. Features a smooth
Hyderabadi polish for a lasting sheen.
features: This elegant bangle features a minimalist design punctuated by delicate floral motifs, each set with sparkling CZ stones. The flower settings are meticulously crafted, catching light from every angle. The bangle's openable design allows for easy wearing.
colors: Golden hue from the 22K gold complemented by the dazzling white brilliance of the CZ stones
creating a harmonious and radiant color palette.
occasions: and special occasions. Adds a touch of sophistication to both traditional Telugu attire and contemporary outfits. Suitable for casual gatherings to family functions.
description: Combines the timeless appeal of gold with modern design sensibilities. The CZ stones offer a brilliant alternative to diamonds at a fraction of the cost, without compromising on sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability, making it a valuable addition to your jewelry collection. A versatile piece that can be worn alone or stacked with other bangles.
